name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 28 (Released), the current situation after multiple earthquakes in Hefei, Anhui: Many citizens set up tents on the roadside of the park to avoid danger, and more people are joining the ranks of setting up tents. According to netizens, since the first earthquake, people have set up tents every day, and some have even set up containers.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Israel announced on Friday that it had attacked Hezbollah's "headquarters" in Beirut. The whereabouts of Hezbollah leader Hassan Nasrallah are currently unknown. In northern Syria, people took to the streets to distribute candy to celebrate the occasion.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 26, Zhaotong, Yunnan. Fruit farmers lined up apples in a row and blocked the road, forcibly stopping vehicles to sell them. The driver was so angry that he ran over them! The fruit farmers surrounded him and asked: How dare you crush our Zhaotong local specialties? Official report: The situation is true, road traffic has been restored, and relevant personnel have been summoned.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The Israeli military said the leader of Hezbollah was killed in the Beirut attack.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Media reports: Lebanese Hezbollah leader Nasrallah died in Israeli military attack.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 27, the US media Newsweek published an article mocking that three years ago, Xi Jinping announced that China had defeated extreme poverty. However, three years later, he announced that living allowances would be issued to the extremely poor.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens discovered that the Zhihu platform has set the four characters "防民之口" (guard against the people's mouths) as sensitive words, and searching for the term on the platform shows: no relevant content was found.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 26, a graduate wrote to his father, saying that he had not found a job since graduation and had to keep it a secret from his family. He interviewed for a non-staff position in a public institution with a monthly salary of only about 2,000 yuan. He said that he was under great pressure at the moment, as he could not disappoint his family and had to pay back his student loans. "I'm really tired," many netizens consoled the author in the comment section.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 28, according to multiple sources, lawyer Zhang Wenpeng had previously co-signed a letter suggesting the abolition of the crime of picking quarrels and provoking trouble. He was recently detained by Sanya police on the charge of picking quarrels and provoking trouble.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 27 (Released) Zhengzhou, Henan. It was reported online that a lawyer was reported to the local bar association by his peers for making remarks in support of Ukraine in a group.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, netizens discovered that the Douyin account of Liang Hongda (stage name: Lao Liang), a famous Chinese critic, was banned by the platform.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of September 27, in Zhengzhou, Henan Province, the Mingmen Cuiyuan real estate project had been unfinished for six years, and the owners who moved into the unfinished building were evicted. One of the owners knelt down and begged for mercy to the leader in front of him.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 28 (Release) A death penalty notice from the Liupanshui Intermediate People's Court in Guizhou was circulated online, saying that a man threw his 3-year-old daughter into another vehicle in order to extort money, causing the 3-year-old daughter to be crushed to death by the car. The man was sentenced to death and executed immediately.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
September 26, Guangdong. A man bought more than a dozen types of bread in a supermarket and found that all of them contained the additive "sodium dehydroacetate". It is reported that long-term intake of dehydroacetic acid may cause damage to the liver, kidneys and central nervous system.
September 24, Jilin. A woman posted a video saying that eating bread contains sodium dehydroacetate, ham sausage contains sodium nitrite, and candy contains acesulfame potassium... The woman said that there is only one life, but people from all walks of life want it.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a man in Shanghai posted a labor contract, which stated: Party B's basic salary is 2,300 yuan, and Party A can pay Party B regularly or irregularly according to the situation, and Party A has no obligation to pay. Many netizens also posted unreasonable clauses in their own labor contracts in the comment section.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 27, Wuhan, Hubei. It was reported online that a driver of Guoxing Taxi Company could not continue driving due to illness in his family, so he returned the car to the company, but the company delayed returning the deposit, which forced the driver to jump off the building. During this period, the company leaders did not come forward. It is reported that the driver has been driving a taxi for more than ten years.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 27, the National Development and Reform Commission emphasized: Private enterprises and private entrepreneurs are our own people.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 27, Wang Hai, a prisoner who had been released after serving his sentence, reported in his real name that the internal management of Qiqihar's No. 63 Prison was in chaos. With the connivance of the prison guards, the prisoners played cards and gambled in the prison area for a long time and used their mobile phones to contact the outside world in violation of regulations. He fell ill while serving his sentence, but the prison guards did not take him to see a doctor in time, which eventually led to necrosis of his left testicle, affecting his fertility.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/G4gG5rAj68

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 28, the official TikTok account of Hong Kong Satellite TV, which had not been updated for several days, was suddenly banned by the platform. It is reported that Hong Kong Satellite TV has been publishing social and livelihood news, attracting the attention of many fans.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: As National Day approaches, kindergartens across the country have assigned handicrafts to children, and many parents and children have made "explosive packs" with national flags inserted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 27, Jinhua, Zhejiang. Late at night, a takeaway boy squatted on the roadside and cried loudly, "Am I wrong?" Passersby came forward to comfort him.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
September 28, Henan. A 10-year-old girl was abandoned on the roadside. The photographer said, "The child can't move. She must be sick. She can only say mom and dad."
August 1 (Released) A baby was abandoned on the roadside. A note on the baby's body read, "Seeking kind people to adopt. The family is financially limited."
September 3, Fuzhou, Fujian. A sanitation worker found a baby boy in the bushes.
September 3, Jilin, an abandoned baby was found in a public toilet.
